testcase.name: Create a new pet
testcase.system-out: Given I have a new pet object with name "Cat" and ID 11.....................passed When I add the new pet......................................................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed And the response body should contain the details of the new pet.............passed

testcase.name: Get pet by valid ID
testcase.system-out: Given I have a valid pet ID.................................................passed When I request the pet by ID................................................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed

testcase.name: Delete an existing pet
testcase.system-out: Given I have an existing pet with ID 11.....................................passed When I delete the pet with ID 11............................................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed And the pet with ID 11 should not exist anymore.............................passed
